page.title: 05OUR LOCAL WARD COUNCILLOR
page.content: Pupils of Hart Plain Middle School interviewed Mrs. Carruthers who is the Cowplain Ward Councillor, she said that she has been a councillor for six years. Before she was a councillor she was a teacher of china painting. She said that she enjoys her job very much. She said her duties were at one time Housing and Amenities and now include Recreation, Environmental Health and Cowplain Ward. Then she said that she served on the subcommittees of Havant Arts Centre, which serves the Borough of Havant in the Old Town Hall and Cowplain Activity Centre. She also said that anyone can ask for help as long as they are in her ward. An improvement she would like to see in the future is the building of a swimming pool in Waterlooville.
